name: Atoll Tale
description:
What is Atoll Tale?

Atoll Tale is a 3D Puzzle-Platformer that takes place on a single looping island. Your objective as the player is to take control of Lula, a shipwrecked pirate and navigate the atoll she has landed on, collecting treasure and finding ship parts to repair Lula’s ship.

Credits:

Andrew Bradbury (SirOvenRoll) - 3D Art, 2D Art

Chloe Brazier (ViolentVioIet) - Animations

Zaven Kazandjian (Dinowolf10) - Programming

Franklin Pugh (SpeedyTortoise) - Level Design
